# Skyhelm
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 12th

**Slot** None

**Price** 20,000 gp

**Weight** 500 lbs.

**Description**

The standard *skyhelm* takes the form of a large, heavy throne-like chair, or any other form of an equivalent size. When installed on a vessel, the *skyhelm* grants that vessel the ability to fly at a rate determined by that vesselâ€™s size. It also engulfs the vessel in an envelope of breathable air at a comfortable temperature, and generates a field of gravity surrounding the ship (which is always oriented towards the keel of the vessel). 

**Construction**

**Requirements** Craft Wondrous Item, *[[Air Walk (Spell)|air walk]]* or *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]**,* *[[Suspension (Spell)|suspension]]*

**Cost** 10,000 gp

**Source:** The Living Sky, pg. xxx
